projects.title: Brain Tumor Segmentation using Attention-Enhanced 3D U-NET
projects.description: Implemented Cross-Shaped Window Attention blocks with Enhanced U-NET on MRI images, achieving 94.7% Dice Coefficient.

projects.title: Leukemia (ALL) Segmentation using Ensemble Modeling
projects.description: Built an ensemble model with InceptionV3, VGG16, and ResNet50 for accurate ALL diagnosis with weighted averaging.

projects.title: Identification of Missing Persons using Deep Learning
projects.description: Developed AI-based 3D face reconstruction and PostgreSQL database system for missing persons search.
